titleStmt.title: Some speciall passages from Warwickshire. Concerning the proceedings of the Right Honourable the Lord Brooke. Sent in a letter from Samburne, to a friend in London, being a true relation of the distractions in those parts, this fourth of August 1642.
titleStmt.author: Johnsons, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
